data.text: Yaké ná-doun zunui Aguul ná-kpɔɛiti. Zunui nii ná-deve wooiti ti Itiyɛle ná-faa ma. Itiyɛle ná-faa ma, ta Ukale.
Gaama ʋe, nà ga ɠimalala nui, gè leʋe nuɓusɛiti kpein ba,
Gè la ɠimalai ɠalani,
Ɓɛ ɠa é lɛɛni geeɠɔlɔgi zu, GALA pɔ bɛ, é zeɠe ná, é yei?
GALA daawooi ɠilagilagi pɛ ka ga gaamai.
Mina tanɔpɛ da daawooiti ma,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, nà faa felegɔ valizu è ma,
Màkɛ, gè mina kpɔɛ ɲaka wo, ɓaa zɛɛiti,
Mazɔlɔɔ anii pɛ ga ʋooʋana zèa, nà ʋa lia ɠɛlɛzu è ʋa,
Mina va botiɠɛ nu ma, maliɠii ɠaazu.
Nui tanigaa ta ná, ta ɗa ti-ɠɛɛ ɠoto,
Nui tanigaa ta ná, ti ɓɔɠɔ ɠaazu ga ti ɲadegɛ,
Nui tanigaa ta ná, ti ɠaazulɛai,
Nui tanigaa ta ná, ti-ɲiigaiti ti ga boɠa zɔkpɔiti,
Moolɛi ná-doun anzanuiti ti fele, ti-laasei ka ga: Fe! Fe!
Gɔvɛalaazu, doun zɔlɔɔtala anzanui,
Nui ɠaazuɠɛzɛiti é ɲɛɛɠulazu la kɛɛɠɛ zu, é ɗa woozotalai ɠɛ ga dee,
Faa saʋagɔ ɠa ge la dɛ gaaɠaani,
koɠɛi ɠoʋe pelei geezuʋɛ,
Wɛlɛ ʋelei wɛɛnzo anzanui a ɗa kɛ la:
Faa saʋagɔ ɠa ná,
duɔi a zeina ga masagi,
anzanui kɛlɛbai wogai da, naa a zeina zini bɛ.
Sua naanigɔ ɠa ná eteai zu, ti wola lɔiɗai gola,
pupuiti, zɛbɛ nɔpɛ ge la ti ʋa,
fasa woliiti,30:26 fasa woliiti: Naati ta ga tufa mi zua goiti, ta ɗa mɔin ʋolu gizeiti ma. zɛbɛ la ti ʋa,
kotogiti, masa ge la ti unda,
kooloiti, niiti nu a ɗa ti zo nɔ ga yeei,
Fuluani saʋagɔ ɠa ná,
zalai, nii ziilɔai é leʋe suaiti pɛ ba,
tɛɛ zinɛi,30:31 tɛɛ zinɛi: Tati pelei taɠiligaa ɓalaa ka ga niiti: sooi ɓaa zaɓei nii a ɗa ɠaalɔ kɔɠɔʋolu valagiti ga, ɓaa mu boli zinɛi.
Ni è ɠɛni ga ɠimalala nui, è ɗa waso,
Mazɔlɔɔ nɔnɔi loɠaai ɠa nu a ɗa gulɔi zɔlɔɔ da,
